name: Merge Dungeon
description:
Hello Friend!

This is my entry into Ludum Dare 45, this game was made within 72 hours from start to finish.

The game is a 2048 game that features combat in it too! This is to follow the Jam theme: Start with nothing. As the 2048 games are about starting with low tiles and building them up to something better.

The balancing of this game isn't amazing, however after the jam has been finished I want to look at changing the game a little to be better!

Thank you for playing <3

Find me on Twitter:  @SaMitchinson
